comments: No other terms below 1.1*10^16.Terms were computed: a(2) by the Lehmers, a(3) by _Max Alekseyev_, a(4) and a(5) by Joe K. Crump, a(?) = 63130707451134435989380140059866138830623361447484274774099906755 by P.-L. Montgomery.
references: R. Daniel Mauldin and S. M. Ulam, Mathematical problems and games. Adv. in Appl. Math. 8 (1987), pp. 281-344.
links: R. K. Guy, The Strong Law of Small Numbers, Amer. Math. Monthly 95 (1988), pp. 697-712. See example 13.
OEIS Wiki, 2^n mod n
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: a(1)-a(5) certified by _Max Alekseyev_, Jan 27 2007, Apr 27 2009.
